app_descript:
Brief: The OnePlus File Manager is a user-friendly tool designed to help you navigate and manage your files effortlessly on OnePlus devices. With intuitive categorization and a simple dashboard, this app streamlines the way you access various files, be it downloads, recent documents, large files, or any other file type. Enhanced security features such as password protection and fingerprint authentication safeguard your private files, giving you peace of mind.
